H0.text: Which World war 2 American general was nicknamed “Vinegar Joe”. Omar Bradley

H1.text: Which World war 2 American general was nicknamed “Vinegar Joe”. Dwight D. Eisenhower

H2.text: Which World war 2 American general was nicknamed “Vinegar Joe”. George S. Patton

H3.text: Which World war 2 American general was nicknamed “Vinegar Joe”. Stilwell

A4.text: Stilwell is often remembered by his sobriquet, 'Vinegar Joe,' which he acquired as a commander at Fort Benning, Georgia.
